hero.description: OpenClaw Manager lets you deploy OpenClaw (formerly Clawdbot) AI assistant with one click. Supports Discord, WhatsApp, Telegram and more platforms. Your data stays under your control.

features.title: Why Choose
features.subtitle: A truly capable AI assistant at your fingertips

localFirst.title: Local First
localFirst.description: Run on your own device with complete data control. No privacy concerns.

multiChannel.title: Multi-Channel Support
multiChannel.description: Supports Discord, WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack and other major messaging platforms.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: 24/7 AI assistant supporting multiple LLMs for intelligent conversations.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.description: End-to-end encrypted communication with auditable open source code.

oneClickDeploy.title: One-Click Deploy
oneClickDeploy.description: Simple installation scripts for deployment in minutes without complex server setup.

modelCompatible.title: Model Compatible
modelCompatible.description: Supports OpenAI, Claude, and various other AI providers.

realtime.title: Real-time Response
realtime.description: Optimized inference engine with millisecond response times for smooth interactions.

openSource.title: Open Source & Free
openSource.description: Fully open source with 100k+ GitHub stars, community-driven continuous iteration.

howItWorks.title: Four Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple installation process, complete deployment in minutes

install.title: Install Manager
install.description: Run npm command to globally install OpenClaw Manager with automatic environment setup.

configure.title: Configure Connection
configure.description: Configure Discord Bot Token and AI model API Key in the Web interface.

pairing.title: Pair & Verify
pairing.description: Pair and verify with the Bot through Discord to authorize your account access.

start.title: Start Using
start.description: After channel probing, your AI assistant is ready to start conversations anytime.

pricing.title: Open Source &
pricing.subtitle: OpenClaw is completely open source and free. You can self-host it or choose future managed services.
